description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场全国性政治运动，由时任中国共产党中央委员会主席毛泽东发动和领导。
description.en: A nationwide political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, initiated and led by then Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，发动并领导了文化大革命。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who initiated and led the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命期间被视为“走资派”的代表人物而遭到批斗，并被迫害致死。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China, who was denounced as a representative of the 'capitalist roaders' during the Cultural Revolution, subjected to struggle sessions, and persecuted to death.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央书记处总书记，在文革期间被视为“走资派”而遭到两次罢黜，文革结束后成为中国第二代最高领导人，主导了拨乱反正和改革开放。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, who was purged twice during the Cultural Revolution as a 'capitalist roader'. After the Cultural Revolution, he became the second-generation paramount leader of China, leading the Boluan Fanzheng and Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，文革期间被确立为毛泽东的接班人，后在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, designated as Mao Zedong's successor during the Cultural Revolution, who died in a plane crash during the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成的政治派系，在文化大革命后期掌握实权。
description.en: A political faction consisting of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen, which held significant power in the later stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东指定的接班人，毛泽东逝世后成为中国最高领导人，并领导了粉碎四人帮的行动。
description.en: Mao Zedong's designated successor, who became the paramount leader of China after Mao's death and led the action to smash the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间任中华人民共和国国务院总理，努力维持国家正常运转。
description.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the Cultural Revolution, who worked to maintain the normal functioning of the state.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会通知

description.zh-cn: 一份由毛泽东主持起草的纲领性文件，其通过标志着文化大革命的全面发动。
description.en: A programmatic document drafted under the supervision of Mao Zedong, the adoption of which marked the full-scale launch of the Cultural Revolution.

en: Smashing of the Gang of Four

description.zh-cn: 由华国锋、叶剑英、汪东兴等人发动的政治事件，逮捕了“四人帮”成员，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: A political event initiated by Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing, and others, which resulted in the arrest of the members of the 'Gang of Four' and marked the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间由青年学生组成的一个群众性组织，是文革初期社会动乱的主要力量。
description.en: A mass organization composed of young students during the Cultural Revolution, which was the main force behind the social turmoil in the early stages of the movement.

nodes.id: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
en: Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党通过的一份历史决议，对文化大革命进行了全面否定。
description.en: A historical resolution passed by the Communist Party of China that comprehensively negated the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，由邓小平等领导人推动的一场旨在纠正文革错误的社会政治运动。
description.en: A socio-political movement promoted by leaders such as Deng Xiaoping after the end of the Cultural Revolution, aimed at correcting the mistakes of the CR.

description.zh-cn: 由邓小平启动的经济改革和社会开放政策，标志着中国进入一个新的历史时期。
description.en: The economic reform and social opening-up policy initiated by Deng Xiaoping, marking China's entry into a new historical period.

description.zh-cn: 1958年至1961年间中华人民共和国的一场经济和社会运动，其失败导致毛泽东权力旁落，成为文革发动的背景之一。
description.en: An economic and social movement in the People's Republic of China from 1958 to 1961, whose failure led to Mao Zedong's loss of power and became one of the backgrounds for the launch of the Cultural Revolution.

en: Three Years of Great Chinese Famine

description.zh-cn: 大跃进运动后，中国大陆发生的一场大规模饥荒。
description.en: A large-scale famine that occurred in mainland China after the Great Leap Forward movement.

description.zh-cn: 一次中共中央扩大会议，会上毛泽东进行了自我批评，刘少奇的威望上升，毛泽东随后退居二线。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the CCP Central Committee where Mao Zedong made a self-criticism, Liu Shaoqi's prestige rose, and Mao subsequently retreated to the second line of leadership.

nodes.id: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

zh-cn: 关于个人崇拜及其后果
en: On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上发表的秘密报告，全面批判斯大林。该报告对毛泽东产生了深远影响。
description.en: A secret report delivered by Soviet leader Khrushchev at the 20th Congress of the CPSU, which comprehensively criticized Stalin. The report had a profound impact on Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林逝世后的苏联领导人，因发表批判斯大林的秘密报告而引发中苏论战。
description.en: The leader of the Soviet Union after Stalin's death, whose secret speech criticizing Stalin triggered the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪、叶群、林立果等人在试图外逃苏联途中，于蒙古温都尔汗坠机身亡的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao, Ye Qun, Lin Liguo, and others died in a plane crash in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, while attempting to flee to the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 文革前夕在中国城乡开展的政治运动，被认为是文化大革命的预演。
description.en: A political movement carried out in urban and rural China on the eve of the Cultural Revolution, considered a rehearsal for the CR.

nodes.id: 评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉

zh-cn: 评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉
评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》
en: On the New Historical Play 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'

description.zh-cn: 由姚文元在毛泽东指示下撰写的文章，批判北京市副市长吴晗的历史剧《海瑞罢官》，被认为是文化大革命的导火索。
description.en: An article written by Yao Wenyuan under Mao Zedong's instruction, criticizing the historical play 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' by Beijing's Vice Mayor Wu Han. It is considered the trigger for the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，因发表《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》而在政治上崭露头角。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four' who rose to political prominence after publishing 'On the New Historical Play Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

nodes.id: 炮打司令部——我的一张大字报

zh-cn: 炮打司令部——我的一张大字报
en: Bombard the Headquarters — My Big-Character Poster

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在中共八届十一中全会期间写的一张大字报，将矛头直指刘少奇和邓小平。
description.en: A big-character poster written by Mao Zedong during the 11th Plenary Session of the 8th CCP Central Committee, directly targeting Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会关于无产阶级文化大革命的决定

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会关于无产阶级文化大革命的决定
en: Decision of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party Concerning the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的纲领性文件之一，规定了运动的目的、方法和政策。
description.en: One of the programmatic documents of the Cultural Revolution, which stipulated the movement's goals, methods, and policies.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间，城市知识青年被大规模派往农村地区进行劳动和再教育的运动。
description.en: A movement during the Cultural Revolution in which large numbers of urban educated youth were sent to rural areas for labor and re-education.

description.zh-cn: 1967年1月发生在上海的夺权事件，开启了全国范围的夺权运动。
description.en: A power seizure event in Shanghai in January 1967, which initiated a nationwide power seizure movement.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，不同群众组织之间发生的武装冲突，导致了“全面内战”的局面。
description.en: Armed conflicts between different mass organizations during the Cultural Revolution, leading to a state of 'full-scale civil war'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命中期进行的一场全国性政治清洗运动，造成大量冤假错案。
description.en: A nationwide political purge campaign carried out in the middle of the Cultural Revolution, resulting in a large number of unjust, false, and wrongful cases.

nodes.id: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
en: Trial of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-Revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 文革结束后，中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭对林彪、江青两个反革命集团案主犯的公开审判。
description.en: The public trial of the principal defendants of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques by a special tribunal of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China after the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在庐山会议上因批评大跃进而被打倒，文革期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who was purged at the Lushan Conference for criticizing the Great Leap Forward and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，文革期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央政治局常委，文革初期被打倒并被迫害致死。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP, who was purged in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution and persecuted to death.

description.zh-cn: 文革前因“《刘志丹》案”被打倒，文革期间被监禁。
description.en: Purged before the Cultural Revolution due to the 'Liu Zhidan novel case' and was imprisoned during the CR.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国务院副总理，文革期间因“六十一人叛徒集团案”被打倒监禁。
description.en: Former Vice Premier of the State Council, who was purged and imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution in the 'Case of the 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 半文盲农民，在文化大革命期间被提拔进入中共中央政治局。
description.en: A semi-literate peasant who was promoted to the Politburo of the CCP during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文革后平反冤假错案的主要推动者之一，后接替华国锋出任中共中央主席（后改称总书记）。
description.en: One of the main proponents of redressing unjust, false, and wrongful cases after the Cultural Revolution, who later succeeded Hua Guofeng as Chairman (later General Secretary) of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由柬埔寨红色高棉政权发动的一场种族灭绝运动，受到中国文化大革命的影响。
description.en: A genocidal campaign launched by the Khmer Rouge regime in Cambodia, which was influenced by the Chinese Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1968年5月在法国爆发的学生运动和总罢工，受到中国文化大革命的影响。
description.en: A student movement and general strike that erupted in France in May 1968, influenced by the Chinese Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国实际控制的领土（不含港澳），是文化大革命发生的主要地点。
description.en: The territory under the actual control of the People's Republic of China (excluding Hong Kong and Macau), and the primary location where the Cultural Revolution took place.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的逝世引发了中共高层的权力斗争，并最终导致了“粉碎四人帮”事件。
description.en: The death of Mao Zedong triggered a power struggle within the top leadership of the CCP, ultimately leading to the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在“粉碎四人帮”事件中起到了关键作用。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who played a key role in the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four' incident.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央办公厅主任，在“粉碎四人帮”事件中负责具体执行抓捕行动。
description.en: Then Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee, responsible for carrying out the arrests during the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four' incident.

description.zh-cn: 1957年开始的政治运动，肃清了对中国共产党的批评声音，为后续的大跃进和文化大革命埋下祸根。
description.en: A political campaign starting in 1957 that silenced criticism of the Communist Party of China, laying the groundwork for the subsequent Great Leap Forward and Cultural Revolution.

en: Criticize Deng and Counter the Right-Deviating Verdict-Reversing Wind

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命末期由毛泽东批准，针对邓小平全面整顿的政治运动，导致邓小平第三次被打倒。
description.en: A political campaign in the late Cultural Revolution, approved by Mao Zedong, targeting Deng Xiaoping's comprehensive rectification. It led to Deng's third purge.

description.zh-cn: 1976年清明节期间，北京天安门广场发生的悼念周恩来、反对“四人帮”的群众性抗议活动。该事件后被定性为反革命事件，导致邓小平下台。
description.en: A mass protest in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, during the Qingming Festival of 1976, mourning Zhou Enlai and opposing the 'Gang of Four'. The incident was later labeled as counter-revolutionary, leading to Deng Xiaoping's downfall.

en: Rehabilitation of unjust, false, and wrongful cases

description.zh-cn: 拨乱反正时期的重要组成部分，为包括刘少奇在内的大量文革及历次政治运动受害者恢复名誉。
description.en: An important part of the Boluan Fanzheng period, which rehabilitated a large number of victims from the Cultural Revolution and previous political campaigns, including Liu Shaoqi.

en: 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党历史上具有转折意义的会议，确立了邓小平的领导核心地位，并开启了改革开放。
description.en: A pivotal meeting in the history of the CCP, which established Deng Xiaoping's core leadership position and initiated the Reform and Opening-up.

en: 6th Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 会议通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》，并完成了领导层更迭，胡耀邦接替华国锋出任中共中央主席。
description.en: The session passed the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' and completed a leadership transition, with Hu Yaobang replacing Hua Guofeng as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是文化大革命的发动者和领导者。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the initiator and leader of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家主席刘少奇在文化大革命期间被当作“党内最大的走资派”打倒，并被迫害致死。
description.en: Then Chairman of the State, Liu Shaoqi, was overthrown during the Cultural Revolution as the 'biggest capitalist roader within the party' and was persecuted to death.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在文化大革命期间被作为“党内第二号走资派”两次打倒。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was purged twice during the Cultural Revolution as the 'number two capitalist roader in the party'.

description.zh-cn: 自四清运动起，毛泽东与刘少奇在政治路线上发生严重分歧，毛泽东发动文革的目的之一就是为了打倒刘少奇。
description.en: Starting from the Four Cleanups Movement, Mao Zedong and Liu Shaoqi had serious disagreements on political lines. One of Mao's objectives in launching the Cultural Revolution was to overthrow Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》的通过被普遍认为是文化大革命正式开始的标志。
description.en: The passing of the 'May 16 Notification' is widely regarded as the official start of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: “粉碎四人帮”事件标志着持续十年的文化大革命结束。
description.en: The 'Smashing of the Gang of Four' incident marked the end of the ten-year Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋与叶剑英、汪东兴等人联手发动了“粉碎四人帮”事件。
description.en: Hua Guofeng, along with Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing, and others, launched the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four' incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英是“粉碎四人帮”事件的关键领导者之一。
description.en: Ye Jianying was one of the key leaders in the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four' incident.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴指挥8341部队执行了逮捕“四人帮”的任务。
description.en: Wang Dongxing commanded Unit 8341 to carry out the arrest of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员在该事件中被逮捕并隔离审查，其政治生涯终结。
description.en: The members of the 'Gang of Four' were arrested and placed under isolated investigation in this incident, ending their political careers.

description.zh-cn: “粉碎四人帮”后，华国锋被推举为中共中央主席和中央军委主席，成为最高领导人。
description.en: After the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four', Hua Guofeng was elected Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, becoming the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东公开信件支持红卫兵，并在天安门多次接见，极大地推动了红卫兵运动的发展。
description.en: Mao Zedong publicly supported the Red Guards through letters and received them multiple times in Tiananmen Square, greatly promoting the development of the Red Guard movement.

description.zh-cn: 红卫兵是文化大革命早期的主要参与者和推动力量，通过“大串联”、“破四旧”等活动将运动推向全国。
description.en: The Red Guards were the main participants and driving force in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, spreading the movement nationwide through activities like the 'Great Networking' and 'Destroying the Four Olds'.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 该决议正式、全面地否定了文化大革命，称其为一场“给党、国家和各族人民带来严重灾难的内乱”。
description.en: This resolution formally and comprehensively negated the Cultural Revolution, calling it 'an internal turmoil that brought serious disaster to the Party, the state, and the people of all ethnic groups'.

description.zh-cn: 作为第二代领导核心，邓小平领导了“拨乱反正”运动，纠正文化大革命的错误。
description.en: As the core of the second generation of leadership, Deng Xiaoping led the 'Boluan Fanzheng' movement to correct the mistakes of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 拨乱反正运动旨在系统性地纠正和否定文化大革命的理论、政策和造成的后果。
description.en: The Boluan Fanzheng movement aimed to systematically correct and negate the theories, policies, and consequences of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进的失败导致毛泽东在党内威望受损并退居二线，这成为他为夺回权力而发动文化大革命的重要动机之一。
description.en: The failure of the Great Leap Forward damaged Mao Zedong's prestige within the party and led to his retreat to the 'second line', which became a significant motive for him to launch the Cultural Revolution to regain power.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进的经济政策失误是导致三年困难时期大规模饥荒的主要原因。
description.en: The policy failures of the Great Leap Forward were the main cause of the widespread famine during the Three Years of Great Difficulty.

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上，毛泽东为大跃进的错误作了自我批评，会后退居二线，由刘少奇、邓小平主持中央日常工作。
description.en: At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, Mao Zedong made a self-criticism for the mistakes of the Great Leap Forward and subsequently retreated to the 'second line', with Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping taking charge of the daily work of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 七千人大会后，刘少奇的威望上升，开始全面主持中央的党政领导工作。
description.en: After the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, Liu Shaoqi's prestige rose, and he began to comprehensively preside over the party and government leadership work of the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告使毛泽东开始关注“防修反修”，并担忧自己死后会像斯大林一样被否定。
description.en: Khrushchev's secret speech made Mao Zedong begin to focus on 'preventing and combating revisionism' and worry that he would be negated after his death like Stalin.

relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上发表了《关于个人崇拜及其后果》的秘密报告。
description.en: Khrushchev delivered the secret report 'On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences' at the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 林彪及其家人在此事件的坠机事故中丧生。
description.en: Lin Biao and his family died in the plane crash of this incident.

description.zh-cn: 四清运动被视为文化大革命的预演，运动期间毛泽东与刘少奇的矛盾激化。
description.en: The Four Cleanups Movement is regarded as a rehearsal for the Cultural Revolution, during which the conflict between Mao Zedong and Liu Shaoqi intensified.

relationships.target: 评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉

description.zh-cn: 姚文元撰写并发表了《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: Yao Wenyuan wrote and published 'On the New Historical Play Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉

description.zh-cn: 这篇文章的发表被认为是拉开文化大革命序幕的导火索。
description.en: The publication of this article is considered the trigger that raised the curtain on the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 炮打司令部——我的一张大字报

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东通过这张大字报，公开了他与刘少奇、邓小平的矛盾，指责他们建立了“资产阶级司令部”，是打倒刘少奇的关键一步。
description.en: Through this big-character poster, Mao Zedong publicized his conflict with Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping, accusing them of establishing a 'bourgeois headquarters,' which was a crucial step in overthrowing Liu Shaoqi.

relationships.target: 炮打司令部——我的一张大字报

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东亲自撰写了这张大字报。
description.en: Mao Zedong personally wrote this big-character poster.

description.zh-cn: 作为解决红卫兵运动后城市青年就业和社会稳定问题的方式，上山下乡运动在文革后期大规模展开。
description.en: As a way to address the employment and social stability issues of urban youth after the Red Guard movement, the Down to the Countryside Movement was launched on a large scale in the later stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: “一月风暴”开启了全国范围的夺权运动，各群众组织间的权力争斗迅速激化，并演变为大规模武斗。
description.en: The 'January Storm' initiated a nationwide power seizure movement, during which power struggles among mass organizations rapidly intensified and evolved into large-scale violent struggles.

description.zh-cn: “清理阶级队伍”是文化大革命中期的一项重要政治运动。
description.en: The 'Cleansing the Class Ranks' was a major political campaign during the middle period of the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文作为主犯在该案中受到审判并被判刑。
description.en: Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen were tried and sentenced as principal criminals in this case.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀在文革期间遭受残酷批斗和迫害，最终致死。
description.en: Peng Dehuai endured brutal struggle sessions and persecution during the Cultural Revolution, which ultimately led to his death.

description.zh-cn: 贺龙在文革期间被迫害致死。
description.en: He Long was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 陶铸在文革期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Tao Zhu was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 陈永贵在文化大革命期间从一个农民被提拔为中共中央政治局委员和国务院副总理。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Chen Yonggui was promoted from a peasant to a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 柬埔寨的红色高棉革命在思想和实践上受到了中国文化大革命的显著影响。
description.en: The Khmer Rouge revolution in Cambodia was significantly influenced by the Chinese Cultural Revolution in both ideology and practice.

description.zh-cn: 法国的五月风暴学生运动受到了中国文化大革命思潮的影响。
description.en: The May 68 student movement in France was influenced by the ideology of the Chinese Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由于“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动以及随后的“四五天安门事件”，邓小平被撤销党内外一切职务，第三次被打倒。
description.en: Due to the 'Criticize Deng and Counter the Right-Deviating Verdict-Reversing Wind' campaign and the subsequent 'Tiananmen Incident', Deng Xiaoping was stripped of all his posts inside and outside the party, marking his third purge.

description.zh-cn: 四五运动被定性为“反革命事件”，直接导致了“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动的升级和邓小平的下台。
description.en: The Tiananmen Incident was labeled a 'counter-revolutionary incident', which directly led to the escalation of the 'Criticize Deng, Counter the Right-Deviating Verdict-Reversing Wind' campaign and Deng Xiaoping's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 此次会议确立了邓小平在党内的核心领导地位。
description.en: This session established Deng Xiaoping's core leadership position within the party.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋在会上因坚持“两个凡是”而受到批判并作了检讨，其权力开始被削弱。
description.en: Hua Guofeng was criticized at the meeting for adhering to the 'Two Whatevers' and made a self-criticism, after which his power began to wane.

position.en: Chairman of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在此次会议上，胡耀邦接替华国锋，当选为中共中央主席。
description.en: At this session, Hu Yaobang succeeded Hua Guofeng and was elected Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 此次会议通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》。
description.en: This session passed the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.
